sd_payload.negative_prompt: (EasyNegative:0.8), (wost quality, low quality:1.4), blurry, blur, bokeh, fog, mist, bloom, (latex, shiny clothes:1.2), tight, skin tight, impossible clothes, white border, impossible body, impossible hand, incorrect fingers
sd_payload.prompt: (masterpiece, best quality, high quality, highres:1.4), extremely detailed, detailed skin, ambient soft lighting, 4K,

functions_prompt.description: use key word to describe a image to make stable diffusion be able to generate image and make music generator be able to generate music.
functions_prompt.name: get_sd_and_musicgen_prompt

bgm_prompt.description: describe the music like: "a light and cheerily EDM track, with syncopated drums, aery pads, and strong emotions bpm: 130", etc.

img_prompt.description: describe the image like: "little dog, gray skin, big eyes, looking at viewer", etc.

openai.img_and_voice_to_prompt:
Here are people's talking about this image: "{voice}"
Now you must accord to this image and people's voice, generate a story and then use that story to generate story screen prompt and bgm prompt.
You don't need to tell me the story, and DO NOT TELL ME what happened. You just give me the prompt by json, which is the key `img_prompt` as story screen prompt and the key `bgm_prompt` as bgm prompt. Keep in mind, just reply me json!
openai.img_to_comment: This picture is a slice generated by prompt generated by GPT4 and image generator based on prompt. Imagine that you are the author of this image. Now your photos will be displayed in art exhibitions. You need to write a 100-word description of this image that explains your creative concept.
openai.json_fix_prompt: Complete the json syntax errors in the following text according to the legal json format. The json must include `img_prompt` as image_prompt and `bgm_prompt` as bgm prompt. You don't need to say any thing except the json.

Cute fox girl.image_prompt: blonde hair, long hair, fox ears, curled hair, fox girl, (fluffy tail), fat tail, hands on the ground, gold eyes, black irises, long eyelashes, thick eyelashes, looking at viewer, smile, (gold cheongsam), belt, [ornate clothes], black bowtie, white thighhighs, black stockings,
